text: Vanuatu national football team is the national football team of Vanuatu. In the Pacific Games they reached the semifinals seven times and the finals once. In the OFC Nations Cup, they reached the semifinals four times. They have never competed in the World Cup. Vanuatu was formerly named New Hebrides. ==References== Category:Oceanian national football teams Category:Sport in Vanuatu
title: Vanuatu national football team
